section.title: Compute ISO Distribution Installation
section.para: You can download and use an ISO image that is based on a Ubuntu Linux Server 10.04 LTS distribution containing only the components needed to run OpenStack Compute. See http://sourceforge.net/projects/stackops/files/ for download files and information, license information, and a README file. For documentation on the StackOps distro, see http://docs.stackops.org. For free support, go to http://getsatisfaction.com/stackops.
